title: Tracing of Cargoes
introduction: The application simulates a simplified tracing scenario of cargoes, every steps from production to sales and finally to the consumerâ€™s hand will be stored on the chain. Users can check the details of the product through the cargo ID therefore to understand the source of the cargo and its authenticity.
characterintro: The application consists of three roles: manufacturer, distributor, and consumer. The rights of each roles are respectively as follows:

Notice.unknow: Failure to transfer the cargo. Input parameters may have errors or unauthorized
Notice.neterror: Failure to transfer the cargo. It may be due to the network or other reasons
